extensionDescription.message: Enhancer for Nebula. Adds some quality of life features to the nebula player.

optionsTitlePlayer.description: Title for the player subsection of options page.

optionsDefaultPlaybackRateTitle.description: Label for default playbackRate of options page.

optionsDefaultPlaybackRateHint.message: The speed the player will be set to initially, e.g. 1.25
optionsDefaultPlaybackRateHint.description: Hint for default playbackRate of options page.

optionsPlaybackChangeRateTitle.description: Label for speed change rate of options page.

optionsPlaybackChangeRateHint.message: The amount to change the speed when scrolling over the new speed button, e.g. 0.1
optionsPlaybackChangeRateHint.description: Hint for speed change rate of options page.

optionsTargetQualitiesTitle.description: Label for target qualities of options page.

optionsTargetQualitiesHint.message: The (heights of) the qualities to target, e.g. 1080, 720
optionsTargetQualitiesHint.description: Hint for target qualities of options page.
